subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Learning and networking established among developing countries trough South-South learning on inclusive growth, social inclusion, technological and institutional innovation. This output will be achieved through (i) development of MDG-based strategies; (ii) Widening access to policy options; and (iii) Strengthening national capacity to deliver.
subproject.title: IPC-IG, BRASILIA
